Py_Admittance
  • Examples

Examples

Note

In order to access these example files, it will be necessary to download or clone the entire Py_Admittance repo from GitHub. The files will be located in the directory examples.

Broquet & Wieczorek (2019) admittance model

Mars_AdmitGlob.py

A script to compute the global theoretical and observed admittance and correlation on Mars given a set of input parameters. The theortical admittance is computed following Broquet & Wieczorek (2019).

Mars_AdmitLoc.py

A script to compute the localized theoretical and observed admittance and correlation on Mars given a set of input parameters. The theortical admittance is computed following Broquet & Wieczorek (2019) and localized to Olympus Mons.

Displacement_strain_planet (DSP) admittance model

Mars_DSPGlob.py

A script to compute the global theoretical and observed admittance and correlation on Mars given a set of input parameters. The theortical admittance is computed using the Displacement_strain_planet package (see Broquet & Andrews-Hanna, 2023).

Mars_DSPLoc.py

A script to compute the localized theoretical and observed admittance and correlation on Mars given a set of input parameters. The theortical admittance is computed using the Displacement_strain_planet package (see Broquet & Andrews-Hanna, 2023) and localized to Olympus Mons.
